talk.author: did:plc:cqpwloeucsh5dlhdvr74r3rm
talk.utter: It ain't just engineers, it's predominantly a bunch of brodudes that don't know the first thing about anything, and those are easily preventable. Ignoring the low hanging fruit because not everyone is as dense as they are is bad policy.
